pages.text:
Cypress Greens
Resort-Style 55+ Golf & Tennis Community in Lake Alfred, Florida
Experience an amazing retirement lifestyle at Cypress Greens, Central Florida's most affordable and vibrant 55+ golf and tennis community. Live the Florida resort lifestyle in this lively, manufactured home community with marvelous amenities and a calendar of events and activities. You'll feel like every day is a vacation.
Socialize at the 7,000 square-foot clubhouse with a variety of recreational activities. Aim for the fairway on our 9-hole regulation golf course. Practice your short game at the beautifully maintained putting green. Play a friendly match on our immaculate tennis courts. Relax in the heated swimming pool and breathe in the stunning serenity of our community lakes. Start the next exciting chapter of your life at Cypress Greens.
Read More
View Homes
about Resort-Style 55+ Golf & Tennis Community in Lake Alfred, Florida
Resort-Style 55+ Golf & Tennis Community in Lake Alfred, Florida
Cypress Greens
Amenities and Activities
Embark on life's ultimate adventure in our 55+ community. Meet your neighbors for events at the clubhouse. Swim a few laps in our heated pool. Chase birdies on the golf course. Get social, stay in shape, make friends, or relax while living in paradise.
9-Hole Golf Course
Swimming Pool
Tennis Courts
Clubhouse

Cypress Greens
Community Experiences
9-Hole Golf Course
Community Experiences
9-Hole Golf Course
The 9-hole course at Cypress Greens facility in Lake Alfred, Florida features 2,845 yards of golf from the longest tees for a par of 35. Tee off on lush fairways and enjoy challenging holes that wind through this picturesque community.
Community Experiences
Fitness Center
Community Experiences
Fitness Center
Elevate your fitness journey at our state-of-the-art fitness center. Enjoy a workout with cardio and weight training equipment in a motivating community atmosphere.
Community Experiences
Lifestyle Program
Community Experiences
Lifestyle Program
Unlock a vibrant lifestyle in our community through our enticing Lifestyle Program. Engage in diverse activities, connect with like-minded individuals, and savor moments of joy. Elevate your living experience with us!

Cypress Greens
Cypress Greens is located in the quaint, small town of Lake Alfred in Central Florida. This lovely golf and tennis community is ideally situated amid natural beauty, citrus groves, sparkling lakes, and everything that makes Central Florida so unique. Lake Alfred is conveniently located within five miles of Interstate 4, Central Florida's major thoroughfare. Within 10 miles of Cypress Greens, there are shopping plazas, restaurants, banks, churches, medical facilities, and everyday conveniences. Only 13 miles from the community in Winter Haven, the Legoland Florida amusement park offers interactive attractions, rides, shows, restaurants and shopping. Orlando, Florida's popular vacation destination, is within 41 miles of Cypress Greens. Just 30 miles away, you can enjoy all the excitement and enchantment of Walt Disney World and Universal Studios.
Things to Do
Airports
Lake Alfred Historical Society Museum
Waldo Wright's Flying Service
Lavender 'n Lace Tearoom & Restaurant
Bok Tower Gardens
Circle B Bar Reserve
Orlando International Airport (MCO)
Tampa International Airport (TPA)
Cypress Greens
Gallery
Cypress Greens - Waterfront Residences
Cypress Greens - Library
Cypress Greens - Clubhouse Interior
Cypress Greens - Swimming Pool
Cypress Greens - Outdoor Pavilion
Cypress Greens - Shuffleboard Courts

https://www.suncommunities.com/florida/cypress-greens
Cypress Greens
Contact Us
FAQ Contact Us
Is lake Alfred, Florida, a good place to live?
Is lake Alfred, Florida, a good place to live?
Lake Alfred, Florida, offers a tranquil, small-town atmosphere amidst the beauty of central Florida's lakes. It's known for its friendly community, affordable housing, and proximity to larger cities like Orlando and Tampa. The city boasts lovely parks, outdoor recreational activities, and local events, making it ideal for families and retirees seeking a peaceful lifestyle.
What are the benefits of buying a manufactured home at Cypress Greens?
What are the benefits of buying a manufactured home at Cypress Greens?
Buying a
manufactured home
at Cypress Greens has benefits, such as affordability, access to resort-style amenities, easy access to local shopping and dining, a tight-knit community, and a fulfilling lifestyle for active adults fostering a sense of belonging.
What recreational activities are offered at Cypress Greens?
What recreational activities are offered at Cypress Greens?
Cypress Greens provides a wide range of recreational activities for residents. Play Golf, pickleball, and cards, enjoy the BBQ area, and relax by the outdoor pool. Our community also offers a fitness center, dance classes, water aerobics, and tennis courts to uphold your physical well-being.
What are the best attractions in Lake Alfred, Florida?
What are the best attractions in Lake Alfred, Florida?
Lake Alfred, Florida, offers a wonderful array of attractions for residents and visitors to enjoy including:
The Barn Antiques
Mackay Gardens and Lakeside Preserve
Heavenly Honey Amish Warehouse
Lake Alfred Historical Society Museum
Waldo Wright's Flying Service
Bok Tower Gardens
Phone:
(866) 367-4309
https://www.suncommunities.com/florida/cypress-greens
Cypress Greens
Contact Us
FAQ Contact Us
Don’t Take it From Us. Hear From our Residents.
"A nice, well-kept community with great neighbors and residents. Love the smaller size, but large enough to have involvement from many residents. Appreciate the "rural" feel away from a large city, but close enough to services in nearby locations."
Don’t Take it From Us. Hear From our Residents.
"Best community. Been here 17 years, wouldn't change anything."
Don’t Take it From Us. Hear From our Residents.
"Cypress Greens is a vibrant, friendly community where residents interact socially and support each other whenever the need arises. I would highly recommend this community to any senior who wants to stay engaged with and enjoy life."
Don’t Take it From Us. Hear From our Residents.
"We enjoy living at Cypress Greens. The park is kept up well and when we do have visitors they seem to like what they see, also."

Cookie Consent Manager
When you visit any website, it may store or retrieve information on your browser, mostly in the form of cookies. Because we respect your right to privacy, you can choose not to allow some types of cookies. However, blocking some types of cookies may impact your experience of the site and the services we are able to offer.
Required Cookies
These cookies are required to use this website and can't be turned off.
Show More Details
Required Cookies
Provider
Description
Enabled
SAP as service provider
We use the following session cookies, which are all required to enable the website to function:
"route" is used for session stickiness
"careerSiteCompanyId" is used to send the request to the correct data center
"JSESSIONID" is placed on the visitor's device during the session so the server can identify the visitor
"Load balancer cookie" (actual cookie name may vary)  prevents a visitor from bouncing from one instance to another
Advertising Cookies
These cookies serve ads that are relevant to your interests. You may freely choose to accept or decline these cookies at any time. Note that certain functionality that these third parties make available may be impacted if you do not accept these cookies.
Show More Details
Advertising Cookies
Provider
Description
Enabled
Google Analytics
Google Analytics is a web analytics service offered by Google that tracks and reports website traffic.

FAQ Contact Us
Is lake Alfred, Florida, a good place to live?
Is lake Alfred, Florida, a good place to live?
Lake Alfred, Florida, offers a tranquil, small-town atmosphere amidst the beauty of central Florida's lakes. It's known for its friendly community, affordable housing, and proximity to larger cities like Orlando and Tampa. The city boasts lovely parks, outdoor recreational activities, and local events, making it ideal for families and retirees seeking a peaceful lifestyle.
What are the benefits of buying a manufactured home at Cypress Greens?
What are the benefits of buying a manufactured home at Cypress Greens?
Buying a
manufactured home
at Cypress Greens has benefits, such as affordability, access to resort-style amenities, easy access to local shopping and dining, a tight-knit community, and a fulfilling lifestyle for active adults fostering a sense of belonging.
What recreational activities are offered at Cypress Greens?
What recreational activities are offered at Cypress Greens?
Cypress Greens provides a wide range of recreational activities for residents. Play Golf, pickleball, and cards, enjoy the BBQ area, and relax by the outdoor pool. Our community also offers a fitness center, dance classes, water aerobics, and tennis courts to uphold your physical well-being.
What are the best attractions in Lake Alfred, Florida?
What are the best attractions in Lake Alfred, Florida?
Lake Alfred, Florida, offers a wonderful array of attractions for residents and visitors to enjoy including:
The Barn Antiques
Mackay Gardens and Lakeside Preserve
Heavenly Honey Amish Warehouse
Lake Alfred Historical Society Museum
Waldo Wright's Flying Service
Bok Tower Gardens

Cypress Greens - Amenities and Activities
Cypress Greens - Amenities and Activities
Resort-Style Community Living in Lake Alfred, Florida
Nestled in the heart of Central Florida, Cypress Greens is a golf and tennis 55+ community for an active retirement lifestyle. This lively community offers resort-style living in paradise with outstanding amenities and a calendar of events and activities. Tee off on our 9-hole golf course, hit the tennis and pickleball courts, relax by the sparkling pool, and meet neighbors at the clubhouse for clubs and card games. Embrace an active 55+ lifestyle at our premier, gated neighborhood in beautiful Lake Alfred.
Clubhouse
Enjoy our 7,000-square-foot spacious clubhouse where residents meet for a variety of recreational activities, games and social events.
Golf Course
Tee off on our 9-hole golf course, with lush fairways, challenging layouts, picturesque views, and a pro shop. Practice precision on our putting green.
Tennis Court
Organize a friendly match at one of our immaculate tennis courts and experience the thrill of the game in a picturesque setting.
Swimming Pool
Put your feet up and relax poolside at our heated swimming pool. Swim laps, try water aerobics, and soak up the Florida sunshine.
Lakes
Breathe in the stunning serenity of our private community lakes or cast your fishing lines for local catch.
Live Your Best Life
Get involved, stay in shape, make new friends, or simply relax, while you enjoy living in the paradise of our golf and tennis community.
